string.value: Is #t4031312# made? I better go see #p2020005# and find out for myself.
I finally got #t4031312# from #p2020005#. I have a feeling #p2060006#'s going to LOVE seeing this. I better head back to Aquarium and see #r#p2060006##k.
I gave #p2060006# the #t4031312#, and in return, got myself the Official Aqua Road Photo Album. Now it's time for me to show this to Kriel in Orbis.
Alright, it's completed. I don't know exactly where you plan on using it, but I really hope you use it where it's needed. It surely does not melt, but please be careful with it, for it may break.
Didn't you say you needed it? If you don't need it right now, then you can come back some other time, when you really need it. I'll keep it in store for you in the mean time.

So you brought the snow? Let me see let me see!! Ahh... it's white, and it's cold... wow, so this is called snow. This is just incredible... and SO PRETTY! I can finally understand what it's like to be simultaneously ice cold and warm. Thank you so much, traveler! I have finally experienced something I'll experience again...
Here, I'll give you #b#t4031310##k. Since you have given me a present that I'll never forget, this photo album is yours for free.
Where did you use #t4031312#? Please think carefully and remember if anyone asked you for it...
Have you gotten the #b#t4031312##k that I asked you to get?
